response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value, not just monetarily but also in terms of its unique features and benefits. Given its significance, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This represents an incredible saving compared to its market value of $800,000. We believe this is a generous offer that allows you to enjoy all the advantages of owning this product while also making a significant financial benefit. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
